data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve sequence enrollments for a contact
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all automation sequence enrollments for a specific contact. Requires the contact ID as a path parameter. Returns a collection of enrollment records showing which sequences the contact is enrolled in, including enrollment status and metadata. Useful for tracking a contact's active and historical sequence participation.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb, specified what is being retrieved (enrollments for a contact), clarified the required input (contact ID), explained the return value (collection of enrollment records), and provided context about use cases for AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: List all automation sequences with filtering

Useful for discovering available sequences or building sequence catalogs.

data.summary_suggestion: Enroll a contact in an automation sequence
data.description_suggestion: Enrolls a contact into an automation sequence. Requires a PublicSequenceEnrollmentRequest body containing the contact ID and sequence ID. Returns a PublicSequenceEnrollmentResponse with enrollment details including enrollment ID, status, and timestamps. This operation initiates the automation workflow for the specified contact. Side effects include triggering any initial sequence steps and creating enrollment records for tracking.
